vulnerability.name: Adobe Experience Manager Author functions reachable
vulnerability.solution:
To safely enable full functionality on the publish instances, configure filters to prevent access to the following nodes: * /etc/* * /libs/* * /admin/* * /crx/* * /system/* * /apps/* * /bin/* * /content* * /libs/* * /libs/shindig/proxy* * /home/* * /tmp/* * /var/*
Then, configure filters to allow access to the following node paths: * /etc/designs/* * /etc/clientlibs/* * /etc/segmentation.segment.js * /libs/cq/personalization/components/clickstreamcloud/content/config.json * /libs/wcm/stats/tracker.js * /libs/cq/personalization/* (JS, CSS and JSON) * /libs/cq/security/userinfo.json (CQ user information) * /libs/granite/security/currentuser.json ( data must not be cached ) * /libs/cq/i18n/* (Internalization) * /libs/granite/csrf/token.json
